head: Expand your earning
text: Create a course once, earn from it your entire life! The more courses you create, the higher your earning!

head: Step-by-step support
text: We understand that online can be hard. That's why we have easy instructions throughout the website and a dedicated support team! Now you can focus on being the best teacher!

head: Creating a course takes 2 minutes!
text: Courses on BeyondExams are collections of Youtube videos! So you can either upload your own videos or choose the best videos from around Youtube to teach!

head: Teach your own way
text: You are no longer restricted by a curriculum or school regulations. At BeyondExams, feel the power of teaching in your own unique way!

head: Inspire students all over India
text: As a nonprofit, we don't just serve the top students. We also connect orphanages and community-run schools with education!
